message: Starting generation of 4-5 questions about delusion types in psychotic disorders
Crafting questions covering persecutory, reference, grandiose, control, thought, somatic, and nihilistic delusions

Successfully generated 5 delusion-type questions: (1) Learning - delusion of reference identification, (2) Application - somatic delusion clinical scenario, (3) Tricky - thought withdrawal vs insertion/broadcasting, (4) Tricky - grandiose vs persecutory distinction, (5) Application - thought broadcasting scenario. All questions include comprehensive explanations with correct rationale and detailed incorrect option feedback. Coverage includes: reference, somatic, nihilistic, persecutory, grandiose, thought withdrawal, thought insertion, thought broadcasting, and control delusions.
